citation_details.title: Chisco: An EEG-based BCI dataset for decoding of imagined speech

citation_details.abstract: The rapid advancement of deep learning has enabled Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs)  technology, particularly neural decoding techniques, to achieve higher accuracy and deeper
